form.title: Submission
form.description:
Please make sure to fill out all sections of the application. While you should provide clear details of your project timelines and scope, an application with lengthy responses is not necessarily preferable! We read through many submissions, so if you can concisely convey your ideas, we would greatly appreciate it. All applications will be received and reviewed on a rolling basis. Only one application per individual and/or team can be submitted at a time.

After completing your project’s pre-specified milestones, an individual or team can re-apply for another grant. Grants are issued in NEAR tokens but payment methods such as USN/ EUR can be issued in exceptional circumstances.

projectName.label: Project Name
projectName.error: Please enter a project name that is at least 1 characters long.

grantType.label: Are you applying for a grant (non-equity) or venture funding (equity)?
grantType.placeholder: Are you applying for a grant (non-equity) or venture funding (equity)?

projectStatus.label: How far along is your project?*
projectStatus.placeholder: How far along is your project?*

projectDescription.label: Project Description
projectDescription.error: Please enter a project description that is at least 1 characters long and less than 100.

fundingAmount.label: How much initial funding do you need?
fundingAmount.error: Please enter an initial funding amount that is at least 1 USN.
fundingAmount.description: Please specify the initial amount you are requesting in USN. Extra funding should be added as milestone. E.g. $50,000 * Grants will be given in USN value of NEAR tokens. (Benchmark: average grant <$50K USN)

budget.label: Estimated Budget
budget.error: Please enter a budget that is at least 1 USN.

milestoneDescription.label: Milestone Description
milestoneDescription.error: Please enter a description that is at least 1 characters long and less than 100.

whatAndWhy.label: What are you building & why?
whatAndWhy.error: Please enter explanation that is at least 1 character long and less than 100.

competitionDifference.label: What makes you different from your competitors?
competitionDifference.placeholder: What makes you different from your competitors?
competitionDifference.error: Please enter explanation that is at least 1 character long and less than 100.

openSourceState.label: Is your project open-source?
openSourceState.error: Please select an open source status.

opensourceComponentUse.placeholder: Which components of the project will be open source?
opensourceComponentUse.error: Please enter explanation that is at least 1 character long and less than 100.
opensourceComponentUse.description: Please provide as much detail as possible.

impactOnEcosystem.label: How will this impact the NEAR Ecosystem?
impactOnEcosystem.placeholder: How will this impact the NEAR Ecosystem?
impactOnEcosystem.error: Please enter explanation that is at least 1 character long and less than 1000.

excitementNear.label: What makes you excited about NEAR?

excitementNear.error: Please enter explanation that is at least 1 character long and less than 1000.

successMesurement.label: How will you measure project success?

successMesurement.error: Please enter explanation that is at least 1 character long.
successMesurement.description: What will success look like for your project? An example can be number of sign ups, active users, total TVL, NEAR ecosystem impact etc.

projectRaisingRound.label: Are you currently raising a round?

attachment.label: Do you have any documents to share with us? (Pitch Deck, Demo Video, ...)
attachment.placeholder: Dropbox, Google Drive, or YouTube Link

firstname.label: First Name

github.label: GitHub Profile URL
github.error: Please enter a valid GitHub profile URL.

twitter.label: Twitter Profile URL

workingAloneOrTeam.label: Are you working alone or in a team?
workingAloneOrTeam.placeholder: Are you working alone or in a team?

aboutTeam.label: Tell us more about your rockstar team and your achievements*
aboutTeam.placeholder: Tell us more about your rockstar team and your achievements*
aboutTeam.error: Please enter a team description that is at least 1 characters long.

membersGithubUrl.label: Github URL of Team Member
membersGithubUrl.error: Please enter a valid GitHub profile URL.

hasPreviouslyReceivedFundingTokensGrants.label: Previously received funding, tokens, or grants from NEAR.

aboutTokensReceivedFromNear.placeholder: Tell us about your received funding, tokens, or grants from NEAR*
aboutTokensReceivedFromNear.error: Please enter explanation that is at least 1 character long and less than 100.

howHeardGrants.label: How did you hear about this Grants Program?
howHeardGrants.placeholder: How did you hear about this Grants Program?
howHeardGrants.error: Please answer how did you hear about this Grants program.
howHeardGrants.description: Please tell us how you found this program! Did you hack with us, see us in a newsletter, or something else?

comments.error: Please enter a comment that is at least 1 character long and less than 1000.

blockchain.description: In order to continue the Grant Application request, you need to publish your grant application to the NEAR blockchain. In case you need assistance, please contact our team.

tx_error.title: The transaction failed
tx_error.description: The transaction failed. Please try again.

generic.title: The submission failed
generic.description: Please review the form errors below, and try again

form.message: Your form contains invalid values, please review and submit again

evaluation-approval.title: Evaluation & Approval
evaluation-approval.description: The Grant Committee will review your application within two weeks. If your proposal meets the program criteria, you will be invited to an interview with two committee members.

acceptance.title: Acceptance or Denial Notification
acceptance.description: All applicants will be notified whether their application has been accepted or denied. If your application is accepted, at this point, you will go through the agreement formation process.

onboarding.title: Onboarding
onboarding.description: Once all your paperwork is complete, your team will onboard to the this Grants and Funding Program. We’ll align on clear timelines, accountability metrics, and reporting expectations. Finally, the FUND3R team will be in contact with you to support your project till completion.
onboarding.description-skip: Once all your paperwork is complete, you will receive some onboarding instructions by email.

submitted.message: 👍 You have successfully completed the application
submitted.description: You will receive a follow up email to confirm your application has been received and separately when the review process has started.

evaluated.message: You are invited to an interview. Please, select available date.

demo.title: Demo Tip
demo.description: Because you are using the demo, just refresh and we will automatically approve your submission.

interview-completed.title: 👍 You have successfully completed the interview
interview-completed.message: You will receive a follow up email to confirm your application has been approved.

denied.message: 🤷‍♂️ Your application has been denied. Please, check comments and submit your application again.

approved.message: 👍 Your funding has been approved, please verify your account.
approved.nft-message: ✨ In order to finish the KYC process, please mint your Soul Bound Token

kyc-completed.title: 🧐 Thank you! We are currently checking your data
kyc-completed.description: We will send you an email once your account has been confirmed. It can take a few days...

kyc-approved.message: 👍 Your account has been approved. To continue please sign the grant agreement.

kyc-denied.message: 🤷‍♂️ Sorry, the KYC has been denied

agreement-partially-signed.message: 👍 You successfully signed the agreement, we are now waiting for the grant giver to also sign the agreement.

demo.title: Demo Tip
demo.description: Because you are using the demo, just refresh and we will automatically sign on our side.

submitted-onchain.message: 👍 You have successfully completed the application. You will receive soon the first payout.

first-payment-sent.message: 👍 We have successfully completed the first payment. The team will contact you soon for the onboarding process.

waiting-submit.message: Let us know when you are done with Milestone {{ number }} and we will start the review.

waiting-blockchain.message: Please submit your milestone to the DAO

waiting-booking.message: Please book your interview with our team in order to validate your milestone

rejection.message: Your milestone application has been denied. Please, check comments and submit your application again.

submitted.message: Please attend your interview with our team in order to validate your milestone.

demo.title: Demo Tip
demo.description: Because you are using the demo, just refresh and we will automatically validate the milestone.

on-the-go.message: Do you want to create a new milestone?

payments.zero: 🚀 Your payments will appear here soon
